Biography

2023-24: (Game-by-Game in PDF) Played in five games … Finished with eight points, two rebounds, two assists, a steal and a blocked shot in a win over FDU-Florham (12/6) … Other point came in season opener against John Jay (11/6), added two rebounds and a block … Had a rebound and a steal in Ivy-opening win against Dartmouth (1/6) … Snared a board in season finale against Princeton (3/9).

2022-23: Did not see any game action.

High School: Spent a prep year at Williston Northampton under head coach Ben Farmer after playing four years of high school ball at Victory Christian Academic (under coach DJ Gay) and Mater Dei (under coach Jason Bryant) in California … New England Prep School Athletic Conference (NEPSAC) Class A Honorable Mention honors at Williston … At Mater Dei, won 2020-21 SoCal regional championship and two Mesa League titles (2019-20, 2020-21) … Named his league’s Defensive Player of the Year three times … Played his AAU ball with California Select … Honor Roll student.

Personal: Son of Kenneth Ubochi … Enrolled in the College of Arts and Sciences.
